name: @calatrava/request-response
description: A set of tools for request validation and openapi documentation for the Calatrava framework

scripts.build-openapi-yaml: ts-node scripts/build-openapi-yaml.ts --requests ./tests/request-types.ts --responses ./tests/response-types.ts --routes ./tests/routes/http --version 0.0.1 --title "A New API" --description "some kind of description" --out ./openapi.yml
